org.epochx.gp.op.mutation
Class PointMutation

java.lang.Object
  org.epochx.gp.op.mutation.PointMutation
All Implemented Interfaces:
GPMutation, Mutation, Operator
public class PointMutation
extends java.lang.Object
implements GPMutation

This class performs a simple point mutation on a GPCandidateProgram.

Each node in the program tree is considered for mutation, with the probability of that node being mutated given as an argument to the PointMutation constructor. If the node does undergo mutation then a replacement node is selected from the full syntax (function and terminal sets), at random.

Constructor Summary
PointMutation(GPModel model)
          Construct a point mutation with a default point probability of 0.01.
PointMutation(GPModel model, double pointProbability)
          Construct a point mutation with user specified point probability.
 
Method Summary

Constructor Detail

PointMutation

public PointMutation(GPModel model)
Construct a point mutation with a default point probability of 0.01. It is generally recommended that the PointMutation(GPModel, double) constructor is used instead.

Parameters:
model - The current controlling model. Parameters such as full syntax will be obtained from this.

PointMutation

public PointMutation(GPModel model,
                     double pointProbability)
Construct a point mutation with user specified point probability.

Parameters:
pointProbability - The probability each node in a selected program has of undergoing a mutation. 1.0 would result in all nodes being changed, and 0.0 would mean no nodes were changed. A typical value would be 0.01.
Method Detail

mutate

public GPCandidateProgram mutate(CandidateProgram p)
Perform point mutation on the given GPCandidateProgram. Each node in the program tree is considered in turn, with each having the given probability of actually being exchanged. Given that a node is chosen then a new function or terminal node of the same arity is used to replace it.

Specified by:
mutate in interface GPMutation
Specified by:
mutate in interface Mutation
Parameters:
program - The GPCandidateProgram selected to undergo this mutation operation.
Returns:
A GPCandidateProgram that was the result of a point mutation on the provided GPCandidateProgram.
